news_header: Mexico is awaiting a response from Google regarding its request to restore the name 'Gulf of Mexico' on Google Maps, after the name was changed to 'Gulf of America' following a declaration by former U.S.
news_original_title: Mexico says it will wait for new response from Google on Gulf of Mexico name dispute before filing lawsuit
news_text: President Trump. President Claudia Sheinbaum stated that if Google does not comply, Mexico will proceed with legal action. The name change has raised concerns about Mexican sovereignty, as the U.S. only controls a portion of the Gulf. Tensions between the two countries have increased, and high-level meetings on trade and security are planned.
